channel.title: 2025-02-16 21:30:00 -0500 -0500 on Srikanth Perinkulam
channel.description: Recent content in 2025-02-16 21:30:00 -0500 -0500 on Srikanth Perinkulam

item.title: 16 Feb 2025 21:30
item.description: Ever since we got her training wheels off, S has been nervous riding down the small hill near the Chapultapec zoo for some reason. M convinced S to ride on Reforma one last time today. She nailed it! Rode all the way to the Angel statue and back without any fuss. With the movers packing all our things this thursday, this would probably be our last ride on Reforma! ðŸ”—
item.content:encoded: Ever since we got her training wheels off, S has been nervous riding down the small hill near the Chapultapec zoo for some reason. M convinced S to ride on Reforma one last time today. She nailed it! Rode all the way to the Angel statue and back without any fuss. With the movers packing all our things this thursday, this would probably be our last ride on Reforma! ðŸ”—
